greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Totally additive with a(prime(n)) = n - 1.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n)={my(f=factor(n)); sum(i=1, #f~, my([p, e]=f[i, ]); (primepi(p)-1)*e)} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 07 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 07 2018
